src:
Tokić v Minsku do osmine finala, Kožul do drugega kroga
03 Nov 2019, 10:30 by STA

Na mednarodnem odprtem prvenstvu Belorusije v namiznem tenisu se je za Bojana Tokića tekmovanje končalo v osmini finala glavnega žreba, ko ga je s 4:1 (5, 8, -9, 9, 9) ugnal Francoz Tristan Flore, v drugem krogu pa je izpadel Deni Kožul. S 4:1 (-5, 11, 6, 9, 5) ga je premagal Kitajec Fei Xue.



Bojan Tokić Foto: Leo Caharija

MINSK > Peter Hribar in Tilen Cvetko sta se poslovila v skupinskem delu tekmovanja.
V igri dvojic sta Hribar in Cvetko prišla do zadnjega kroga predtekmovanja, kjer sta bila od njiju boljša Japonca Hirato Shinozuka in Kaker Sones 3:0 (8, 0, 7). Hribar in Cvetko sta nastopila tudi v konkurenci do 21 let. Hribarja je s 3:1 9, -9, 11, 7) izločil Belorus Vladzislau Rukliatsou, Cvetka pa s 3:2 (-7, 9, -13, 2, 8) Nemec Cedric Meissner.
Slovenska izbrana vrsta je na mednarodnem odprtem prvenstvu Belorusije v Minsku nastopila brez Darka Jorgiča, ki ga danes z vodilno ekipo nemške Bundeslige čaka dvoboj s petouvrščeno ekipo Werder Bremen.
V glavni žreb tekmovanja sta bila neposredno uvrščena Bojan Tokić, ki je bil drugo postavljeni nosilec, in Deni Kožul, ki je bil šestnajsti nosilec, medtem ko sta Peter Hribar in Tilen Cvetko morala igrati v predtekmovanju. Oba sta v svoji skupini osvojila drugo mesto.
V glavnem žrebu sta tako Tokić kot Kožul uspešno prebrodila prvi krog. Tokić je s 4:1 (12, -10, 8, 5, 4) premagal Julesa Rollanda, v drugem pa je bil s 4:2 (9, -8, -7, 9, 6, 5) boljši še od Rusa Vildana Gadijeva. Pot v četrtfinale mu je preprečil Francoz Tristan Flore, ki se je uvrstil v polfinale. Po zmagi nad madžarskim Kitajcem Kaiyang Lujem s 4:1 (4, 6, -13, 1, 3) je bil v drugem krogu za Kožula usoden Kitajec Fei Xue.
text:
Tokić in Minsk to the eighth finals, Kozul to the second round
03 Nov 2019, 10:30 by STA

At the Belarus Open Table Tennis Championship, Bojan Tokic ended the competition in the eighth finals of the main draw when he was beaten by Frenchman Tristan Flore in 4: 1 (5, 8, -9, 9, 9). Deni Kozul dropped out. He was beaten 4: 1 (-5, 11, 6, 9, 5) by Fei Xue of China.



Bojan Tokic Photo: Leo Cahari

MINSK> Peter Hribar and Tilen Cvetko say goodbye to the group stage of the competition.
In the doubles game, Hribar and Cvetko reached the final round of pre-match, where the Japanese were better than Hirato Shinozuka and Kaker Sones 3-0 (8, 0, 7). Hribar and Cvetko also competed under the age of 21. Hribar was eliminated by Belarussian Vladzislau Rukliatsou with 3: 1 9, -9, 11, 7, and Cvetka was eliminated by Cedric Meissner 3: 2 (-7, 9, -13, 2, 8).
The Slovenian selection of the kind played at the Belarus Open in Minsk without Darko Jorgič, who is now facing a duel with the five-ranked Werder Bremen team with the German Bundesliga leading team.
The main draw of the competition was directly ranked Bojan Tokic, who was the second-placed holder, and Deni Kozul, who was the sixteenth-seeded player, while Peter Hribar and Tilen Cvetko had to play in the pre-match. Both won second place in their group.
In the main draw, both Tokić and Kozul successfully went through the first round. Tokic beat Jules Rolland with 4: 1 (12, -10, 8, 5, 4), and in the second he was better than the Russians with 4: 2 (9, -8, -7, 9, 6, 5) Vildana Gadiev. He was prevented from reaching the quarterfinals by Frenchman Tristan Flore, who qualified for the semifinals. After defeating Hungarian Chinese Kaiyang Lui by 4-1 (4, 6, -13, 1, 3), Fei Xue was fatal to Kozul in the second round.
